{{TeyvatQuest|title=As by a God's Side|chapter=3|act=5|part=2}}

==Steps==
# Go to [[Caravan Ribat]] to meet up with [[Dehya]]
# Find [[Tighnari]] at [[Pardis Dhyai]]
# Talk to Dehya after leaving Pardis Dhyai
# Track [[The Doctor]] down together with Dehya
#* Teleporting or logging out during this step may reset to Step 2.
# Talk to Dehya
# Go to [[Port Ormos]]
# Follow the [[Fatui]] soldiers
#* The Traveler will enter [[Stealth]]
# Hide yourself in [[Wikala Funduq]]
# Return to Pardis Dhyai as quickly as possible
# Defeat the attacking Fatui
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Fatui Skirmisher - Pyroslinger Bracer;Fatui Skirmisher - Geochanter Bracer}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Fatui Skirmisher - Electrohammer Vanguard;Fatui Skirmisher - Pyroslinger Bracer}}
#* Wave 3: {{Enemy List|Fatui Skirmisher - Electrohammer Vanguard;Fatui Pyro Agent}}
# Talk to Tighnari
# Check on Tighnari and Dehya
# Go to where [[Haypasia]] is
#* Leaving Pardis Dhyai before completing this step will reset to Step 9.
# Wait until the agreed time (19:00 â€“ 21:00)
# Go to the [[Grand Bazaar]]

==Gameplay Notes==
* The last step of this quest and {{Quest|To the Wise}} will alternatingly block each other because of Nilou's and other NPCs' involvement in both.
* If {{Quest|The Unanswerable Problems}} has been completed, Tighnari can be found sitting on top of [[Karkata]] (in cube form) after he is wounded. Otherwise, Tighnari will simply be sitting on the floor.
* Completing the quest grants the {{Achievement|Victory Road}}.

;(While following the Fatui)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 6 skirmisha 02.ogg}} '''Fatui Sergeant:''' I used to hold a position in our homeland, and back then, The Doctor spoke in a very different way from the way he speaks now. Maybe the way people talk in Sumeru has rubbed off on him?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 6 skirmisha 03.ogg}} '''Fatui Sergeant:''' It's always like that when you spend too long away from home. When he gets back to Snezhnaya, perhaps it will also take him some time to get used to the life there again.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 6 skirmishb 02.ogg}} '''Fatui Soldier:''' Huh? But Sir, that... That can't be right.

;(While following the Fatui)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 6 skirmisha 04.ogg}} '''Fatui Sergeant:''' No, no, I remember it like it was yesterday! Both his expressions and tones are now very different.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 6 skirmisha 05.ogg}} '''Fatui Sergeant:''' Also, for some reason, he seems like he's... all smiles now.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 6 skirmishb 03.ogg}} '''Fatui Soldier:''' You must be mistaken... Nobody's supposed to look happy when they're on a business trip.

;(After following the Fatui)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 6 dehya 03.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' The Doctor is on that boat.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 6 dehya 04.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Hmph, so he told the truth after all. He is actually leaving Sumeru.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 6 dehya 05.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Let's get closer and find a place to hide so we can observe him.

;(Hide behind the wall)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 dehya 01.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' This place will do. We can hide here while we keep an eye on the boat.
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (So The Doctor didn't lie about leaving Sumeru... But, could it really be that simple?)
:{{DIcon}} Are we sure he's not planning something...?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 dehya 02.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' ...!?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Uh oh!
:{{DIcon}} What's the matter?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' He... he saw us...
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' ...!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 dehya 03.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Huh, is he waving at us?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 dottore 01.ogg}} '''The Doctor:''' It's time to say goodbye.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 dehya 04.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Wait, is he the only person on the boat?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Huh? You mean there's nobody with him?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 dehya 05.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' ...And where are all the soldiers we saw in the port just now?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' They were all here just a few minutes ago, but now, they've vanished...
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 dehya 06.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' So this was a trap...
:{{DIcon}} But there's nobody around us.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 dehya 07.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Wait, don't tell me that...
:{{Black Screen|The boat carrying The Doctor sails out of the harbor...}}
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 dottore 02.ogg}} '''The Doctor:''' "Luckily, there is still time left for me to take care of everything before I leave."

:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 dehya 08.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Oh no...
:{{DIcon}} Uh-oh!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 dehya 09.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' They might be after Haypasia. Let's get back to Pardis Dhyai!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Huh? What do you mean?
:{{DIcon}} I just remembered...
:{{DIcon}} Haypasia once connected her consciousness to [[The Balladeer]]...
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 dehya 10.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' I'm afraid that she's seen something that she wasn't supposed to see. If I were the Fatui, I would also try to take her away. And if I couldn't...
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh no! Are you saying they're going to kill her!?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 7 dehya 11.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Let's go!
----
;(Approach Pardis Dhyai)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 8 tighnari 01.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Pardis Dhyai is not a place you Fatui can just show up and do as you please.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 8 skirmishsoldier 01.ogg}} '''Fatui Sergeant:''' I believe we've already made ourselves quite clear. Our superior gave us permission to search for and collect medicinal herbs in Pardis Dhyai for research purposes.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 8 tighnari 02.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' But you've been in Sumeru for some time already. I find it coincidental that you chose to only come here today.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 8 skirmishsoldier 02.ogg}} '''Fatui Sergeant:''' Even the [[Azar|Grand Sage]] himself may not have the right to question our research, much less an ordinary scholar like yourself.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 8 skirmishsoldier 03.ogg}} '''Fatui Sergeant:''' I've done my duty to inform you. Don't make things difficult for yourself.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 8 tighnari 03.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' It would seem that my words have fallen on deaf ears.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 8 tighnari 04.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' You can keep trying to deny it, but coming to Pardis Dhyai now? I'm pretty sure you're not just looking for herbs.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 8 skirmishsoldier 04.ogg}} '''Fatui Sergeant:''' With all due respect, your baseless speculations will only lead to unnecessary trouble.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 8 tighnari 05.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Well, you only have your Harbinger to blame. He knows nothing about keeping a low profile.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 8 tighnari 06.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' I may be staying at Pardis Dhyai as a scholar, but that doesn't mean I'm no longer a Forest Watcher.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 8 tighnari 07.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' It is still my duty to protect the peace and safety of the scholars who have contributed so much to Sumeru.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 8 skirmishsoldier 05.ogg}} '''Fatui Sergeant:''' Then it seems our conversation has hit an impasse.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 8 tighnari 08.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' No one will lay a hand on you, Haypasia... Not on my watch!

;(After the cutscene)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 9 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Tighnari! Are you alright?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 9 tighnari 01.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' I'm fine!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 9 dehya 01.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' These Fatui have really crossed the line! Time to teach them a lesson!

;(After defeating the first wave of Fatui)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 9 skirmishb 01.ogg}} '''Fatui Soldier:''' There's no use resisting! Give us Haypasia!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 9 tighnari 02.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Keep dreaming!
:{{A|Vo xmaq302 9 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Yeah Tighnari, beat him up!

;(After defeating the second wave of Fatui)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 9 skirmishb 02.ogg}} '''Fatui Soldier:''' The Doctor's orders are absolute.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 9 dehya 02.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Yeah? You've been someone's lapdog for so long that you don't know anything else now!

;(After defeating the third wave of Fatui)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 tighnari 01.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' We're not getting anywhere... {{Traveler}}, Paimon, please go to Haypasia. We need to make sure they don't try to sneak around and attack from behind.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Got it!
:;(The Traveler and Paimon approach Haypasia in the greenhouse)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Haypasia's still here. Doesn't look like anyone's broken in...
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' ...
:'''{{Traveler}}:'''  (She appears unharmed, but why is she so still?)
:;(The Traveler checks on Haypasia)
:'''{{Traveler}}:'''  (Phew, she's just sleeping.)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Well, how is she?
:{{DIcon}} Everything's fine. She's sound asleep.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, that's good...
:;(The Traveler enters a state where everything else is desaturated)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 01.ogg}} '''???:''' So, you think this is over.
:;(The Balladeer appears behind the Traveler in grayscale)
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (That voice...)
:{{DIcon}} The Balladeer!?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' What! The Balladeer is here!?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 02.ogg}} '''???:''' Haha, I've missed that look of abject horror. You've given me that look every time we meet.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' But uh, where is he?
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (Paimon can't see him! So is he... a spirit? A ghost? Wait...)
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (Is it because I made physical contact with Haypasia? Is The Balladeer in her consciousness?)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 03.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' I can hear all of your thoughts, you know.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 04.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' Don't you remember? I already "saw" you the first time you came to Pardis Dhyai and made contact with Haypasia.
:{{DIcon}} What did you do to Haypasia?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 05.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' I didn't need to do anything. It is her honor to be able to connect her consciousness with me.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Uh, who are you talking to? ...It can't be The Balladeer, right? Hehe, that's impossible...
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 06.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' I know you must be curious. I might as well tell you that I decided to enter Haypasia's consciousness the moment I sensed your touch.
:{{DIcon}} But why?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 07.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' I wanted to observe you on a fool's errand.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 paimon 08.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hey, {{Traveler}}! Wh&mdash;What are you doing...
:{{DIcon}} Paimon, please stay quiet for now...
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 08.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' My deification is nearly complete. All that's left now are just some final details.
:;(Lightning bolts strike at the Traveler's position)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 09.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' Do you understand? Even if you manage to rescue Lesser Lord Kusanali, it will be impossible for you to defeat a bona fide god like me.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 10.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' Is it wise to force that childlike god into a divine battle against me?
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (The Akademiya acted even faster than we thought...)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 11.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' Scholars consider the God of Wisdom to be the sum total of their faith. It's how they can justify reverence for a god as they construct it.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 12.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' But this also shows that humanity's worship of gods is a combination of blasphemy and exaltation. It's truly laughable.
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (If you can hear my thoughts, I want to ask you a question.)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 13.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' Yes, what is it?
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (You're acting more friendly than usual, or am I mistaken?)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 14.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' Yeah, I'm in a good mood, which is why I'm talking to you like this.
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (...But, are you really okay with all this?)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 15.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' What do you mean?
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (The Akademiya plans to infuse your consciousness with [[Divine Knowledge Capsule]]s... this is extremely risky.)
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (Even if the Akademiya's theories are correct, and you manage to gain the wisdom of a god...)
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (You would probably no longer remain yourself. You will become the new "Greater Lord Rukkhadevata" for the Akademiya.)
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (Even if it means losing yourself, would you still want to become a god?)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 16.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' Hmph, those words almost make you sound like a friend who actually cares.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 17.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' But you're wrong. I'm different from all of you.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 18.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' I was born to become a god. My entire life up until this point has just been a meaningless routine.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 19.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' Just think about a sheet of paper... By itself, it holds no meaning. The content recorded on it is what gives it value.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 20.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' All "I" had recorded down before were some painful memories and boring human feelings. Such senseless drivel should have been erased a long time ago.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 21.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' Indeed, to me, the sight of you fools and your futile struggles is far more amusing. Tell me, just what has this world done for you to protect it with such zest and conviction?
:{{DIcon}} ...You wouldn't understand.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 22.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' I'm connected to your consciousness, so I can hear what you're thinking and sense the depth of your determination.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 23.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' This is a good conversation we're having, so here's a word of advice... Let go of your misguided guardian complex. You know nothing about the truth.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 24.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' It'll be for your own good, as well as everyone else's. Humans are a species that can only find bliss in ignorance.
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (...If that's truly what you believe, why did you keep your connection with Haypasia? Surely, with the power you've come to possess, you can cut her off with just a thought.)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 25.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' Ah, you've seen my affection for her. If you were in my position, I think you'd feel the same way.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 26.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' She peered into my consciousness and saw my past. Someone like that is qualified to become my first follower.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 27.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' All gods need followers, so Haypasia has been chosen. Her appearance heralds my imminent arrival at the throne of divinity, while her worship shall become my glory.
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (...Is that so?)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 28.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' You're doubting me again? No matter. Soon, you'll know what kind of authority you're challenging.
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (If you truly cherish your follower, you should protect her from harm.)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 29.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' Who wants to hurt my devout follower?
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (It seems that The Doctor does not wish for her to stay in Sumeru and continue receiving treatment here. Isn't that a little suspicious?)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 30.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' The Doctor wants to hurt my first follower?
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (...Doesn't that make you mad?)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 31.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' Hehehe...
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 32.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' ...Hahahaha. How very amusing. Has anyone ever told you that you're not good at sowing discord?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 33.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' The Doctor has never known his place. Even now, the puny human thinks himself capable of interfering in the business of the new god.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 34.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' You're still too naive if you think a few words will be enough to convince me to destroy The Doctor, but I'm willing to give you a gift, just like my expression of affection towards Haypasia...
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 35.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' It is an honor for you to be able to stand here and speak with me. As my listener, you will be rewarded.
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (That look on your face... What are you planning?)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 scaramouche 36.ogg}} '''The Balladeer:''' Both good things and bad things can be called gifts. After all, gods have never needed to be reasonable.
:;(The Balladeer exits with a flash of lightning)
:;(The weather changes to a lightning storm)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 paimon 09.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Waaah!? Paimon hears thunder!
:{{DIcon}} Thunder!? Could it be The Balladeer?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 paimon 10.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' That person Paimon couldn't see was The Balladeer? He sure chatted with you for a while!
:{{DIcon}} I didn't expect that, either...
:{{DIcon}} He's become... milder, but somehow, even more deranged.
:;(Multiple violent lightning bolts strike)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 paimon 11.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Uh? Where is the storm headed!?
:{{DIcon}} It can't be... Is The Balladeer using the [[Gnosis]] to change the weather?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 10 paimon 12.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' That means anyone outside is in danger! Let's go, Tighnari and Dehya still must be fighting!
{{Dialogue End}}
{{Quest Description|update|Something unexpected has caught you off guard, resulting in you hurrying back to Pardis Dhyai. There, you are greeted by...}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach Tighnari and Dehya)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 11 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, have the Fatui retreated?
:{{DIcon}} Tighnari and Dehya are over there!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 11 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hey! What happened to you!?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 11 dehya 01.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' He's hurt.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 11 tighnari 01.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' I'm fine... Ugh!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 11 dehya 02.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Don't move. I've seen Eremites get struck by lightning before. You need to rest.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 11 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Struck by lightning!?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 11 dehya 03.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' We were fighting, and just as things started looking grim, the weather suddenly became extremely strange. Lightning started attacking everyone, almost as if it were alive.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 11 dehya 04.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Luckily, there were only two of us, and both of us were nimble enough to dodge most of the strikes. There were a lot of Fatui, though, and they were being torn to shreds by the bolts of lightning.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 11 tighnari 02.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' With that, all the Fatui soldiers were forced to retreat...
:{{DIcon}} Your wound...
::{{A|vo xmaq302 11 tighnari 03a 1.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' It's alright.
:{{DIcon}} ...I'm really sorry.
::{{A|vo xmaq302 11 tighnari 03b 1.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Why are you sorry?
::{{DIcon}} I might have triggered the thunder and lightning...
::{{A|vo xmaq302 11 tighnari 03b 2.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Huh... It's alright, I'm sure you also never expected this to happen. Don't blame yourself.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 11 tighnari 04.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' My wound aside, you look like... you've seen something unpleasant. Is Haypasia alright?
:{{DIcon}} She's okay for now, but I want to tell you something.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 11 tighnari 05.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Ugh...!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 11 dehya 05.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Hey! Didn't I tell you not to move?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 11 tighnari 06.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Just in case... Ugh! Let's... go to Haypasia's place, and talk about things there.

;(Approach Haypasia)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 tighnari 01.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' ...
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 tighnari 02.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Thank goodness, she's fine.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hey, how about taking care of yourself first?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 tighnari 03.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' I understand my condition... *grimace* The wound is not fatal. I'll be alright.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Ugh, the more you understand medicine, the worse of a patient you become...
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 dehya 01.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' I know. They always think they can push through the pain.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 tighnari 04.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Ugh... agh!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, he sat down!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 tighnari 05.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Let me rest for a bit... *exhale* Sorry, {{Traveler}}, now you may start.
:{{Black Screen|You recount everything from "meeting" The Doctor at Port Ormos to your encounter with The Balladeer while checking up on Haypasia.}}
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' So that's what you were talking to The Balladeer about? Paimon can't believe what he's thinking...
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 tighnari 06.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' The Akademiya's... god creation plan... How ridiculous.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 dehya 02.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' That sounds, uh... ambitious, I guess? Anyway, this is all way beyond me.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 dehya 03.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' As long as I can enjoy every day with a drink in my hand, tasty food in my stomach, and a good night's rest, that's enough. I'll only work when I have to.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 dehya 04.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Ahaha, I must be the least ambitious person who's ever set foot in Pardis Dhyai.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 tighnari 07.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Don't say that. I haven't even thanked you for your help back there.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 dehya 05.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Don't mention it.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 dehya 06.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Well, if nothing else, all this proves that The Doctor really did have some urgent matter to attend to, and left Sumeru in a hurry.
:{{DIcon}} Yeah, and I also have a theory.
::{{DIcon}} I think The Balladeer is the reason why The Doctor is targeting Haypasia.
::{{DIcon}} Her consciousness connected to The Balladeer, and she has seen his past...
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 dehya 07.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Hmm. Maybe the Fatui want to cover up some secret of The Balladeer? Is that why they tried to seize Haypasia?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' You said The Balladeer claimed that Haypasia has seen his past... So what could be there?
:{{DIcon}} For now, I'm still not really sure.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 dehya 08.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Have you noticed? The Balladeer is not happy with The Doctor's actions. He thinks The Doctor has no right to consider himself as his equal.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' So, if The Doctor was to show up again, would The Balladeer zap him with lightning?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 dehya 09a.ogg}}<!--{{A|vo xmaq302 12 dehya 09b.ogg}}--> '''Dehya:''' Based on what {{Traveler}} has said, I think he would. Having The Doctor gone benefits him as well as us.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 dehya 10.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' In other words, we've successfully completed this stage of the plan! The Doctor is out of the picture now.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Yay, that's a big accomplishment!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 tighnari 08.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Ugh! I'm... also happy for you.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 dehya 11.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Thank you for the help, Tighnari. Make sure you rest up for now.
:{{DIcon}} Yes, please do get some rest.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 tighnari 09.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Yeah, yeah... alright.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 dehya 12.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Okay, that wraps things up for us here at Pardis Dhyai. {{Traveler}}, it's about time we rendezvous with the others at the Grand Bazaar.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 12 dehya 13.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Let's continue to keep a low profile. You can head there once you're ready.

;(Talk to Tighnari again)
:{{A|vo dialog xmaq302 tighnari 03.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' You can just focus on your plan. Leave Haypasia to me.
:{{A|vo dialog xmaq302 tighnari 04.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' My wound isn't going to get in the way... Argh! Okay... Guess I'll sit still for a little while longer.
----
;(Approach Alhaitham and Cyno at the agreed time in the Grand Bazaar)
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 01.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' Alright, everyone is here.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 01.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' How did everything go? Any luck with your missions?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 02.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' Let's each report back one by one. I'll start first.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 03.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' We have made the necessary modifications to the Akasha Terminal. In addition, the props required are also ready.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 02.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' I'll go next. {{Traveler}} and I went to Pardis Dhyai. The situation was a bit complicated, but we found Tighnari. Unfortunately, he was wounded during a fight.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 cyno 01.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' ...Who was behind it?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 03.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Uh... Well, that's the tough part... What should I say, {{Traveler}}? "The Fatui" or "The Balladeer"?
:{{DIcon}} Let's go with "The Balladeer."
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 cyno 02.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' ...
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 04.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' After some back-and-forth, we confirmed that The Doctor has left Sumeru by boat. He has something urgent to attend to back in Snezhnaya.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 05.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' So, we've successfully removed The Doctor from the picture. Also, Tighnari's already resting, so he'll be okay.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 04.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' Good.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, Tighnari also asked us to tell you this message! "Trust your own senses and experiences."
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 cyno 03.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' Alright... I'll remember that.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 cyno 04.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' Everything also went smoothly on my side. The Eremites should have arrived at their destination by now.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 cyno 05.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' To avoid alerting the quarry, they will stay there for now.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 06.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' I can't believe you actually got so many Eremites into [[Sumeru City]]!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 cyno 06.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' It's all thanks to Rahman and his brave team, as well as their bold strategy.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 05.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' It appears to have been very effective. I'm glad to hear it.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 06.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' Well, is that everything? Okay, this meeting is adjourned.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 07.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Huh? Wait, you mean that's it?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 07.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' Well, what else is there to discuss?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 08.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Shouldn't you end with some words of encouragement? You know, to fire us up now?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 08.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' Personally, I'd rather we all go home and get some rest.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 cyno 07.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' ...
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 09.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Alhaitham, you... *sigh*
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 09.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' Oh, and if you wanted someone to say something to that effect, then I must reiterate that I'm here to strategize, not to lead.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 10.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' So you should find someone more suitable to do that.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 10.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' But I thought all of you Akademiya big-shots were great speakers?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 11.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' Then I should remind you that I'm the Scribe.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 11.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' I know that, so what?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 12.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' A Scribe is responsible for recording meetings, not speaking.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 12.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' ...Fine, whatever.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 13.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Well, Cyno doesn't seem to be much of a talker, either. I guess that leaves it to my "employer."
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 cyno 08.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' Employer?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 14.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Yep, {{Traveler}} hired me.
:{{DIcon}} She asked for a smile as her payment.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 15.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Haha, that's right. So c'mon, boss! What do you have to say for the team?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Yeah! Say something to boost morale!
:{{DIcon}} Hmm... let me think...
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 nilou 01.ogg}} '''???:''' Huh? What are you all doing here?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, it's [[Nilou]]!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 nilou 02.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' Hey everyone! I'm not disturbing you, am I?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 16.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Not at all. I was actually just about to go find you.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 nilou 03.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' Heehee. Uh, judging from the group and all your serious faces, you were discussing something important, weren't you?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 nilou 04.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' But you also look like you're up to no good... Haha, seems pretty interesting.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 13.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' Welcome, Nilou. Would you like to join us?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 nilou 05.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' Huh? Join you?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 nilou 06.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' You mean... you also want to discuss something important... with me?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 14.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' Yes, something very important.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 15.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' Nilou, are there any breaks in your performance schedule in the upcoming days?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 nilou 07.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' Huh? Wait, you're seriously inviting me?
:{{Black Screen|Alhaitham tells Nilou of the plan on Jnagarbha Day...}}
:{{Black Screen|Nilou is shocked at first, but it isn't long before she's bubbling with excitement and anticipation.}}
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 nilou 08.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' I... I can't believe my ears! You are truly the bravest and most passionate people of Sumeru, well, that... I've ever met!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Ahem!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 nilou 09.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' Oh right, {{Traveler}} and Paimon are not from Sumeru, but you are awesome as well!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hehe, that's right!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 nilou 10.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' I... I must admit that I'm a little scared.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 nilou 11.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' But I'll try my best for Lesser Lord Kusanali. If I can somehow use my abilities to help you, then count me in.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 cyno 09.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' Remember, believe in yourself.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 nilou 12.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' ...Okay! I'll get my friends at the Grand Bazaar to help us tomorrow!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 17.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Just remember not to say too much. Be discreet.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 nilou 13.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' Yep, you got it!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 16.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' All the preparations are done. Now, can we finally conclude this meeting?
:{{DIcon}} Yeah. Tomorrow, we are going to save a god.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 18.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' So, have you thought up what you'd like to say, boss?
:{{DIcon}} It's hard to believe everything that has happened till now...
:{{DIcon}} And our actions will bring change to many things tomorrow.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Yep yep! It's a grand plan, and we're all super awesome!
:{{DIcon}} That's right, so...
::{{DIcon}} Just get a good night's sleep, everyone!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 19.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' Hahaha!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 cyno 10.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' Well said. A good night's rest before an operation can be the difference between success and failure.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 17.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' ...Thankfully, I've had my place to myself recently. It's been nice and quiet.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 dehya 20.ogg}} '''Dehya:''' ...Huh?
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 alhaitham 18.ogg}} '''Alhaitham:''' Oh, huh, nothing.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Alright, let's all go home and get a good night's sleep, so we can be up early tomorrow!
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 nilou 14.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' Okay, so I guess that means it's time to say goodnight now.
:{{A|vo xmaq302 13 paimon 08.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Yep! Goodnight, everyone.
{{Dialogue End}}
